data.name: React Course
data.bio: This course lasted for over 10 hours and covered JavaScript and React. I am excited to apply the knowledge I gained from this course to create dynamic and interactive user interfaces.

data.name: Tailwind Course
data.bio: Common popular CSS framework that streamlines the process of building responsive and visually appealing websites. It provides a comprehensive set of pre-designed UI components and utility classes that can be easily customized to fit the needs of any project. Using Tailwind can save developers a significant amount of time and effort, making it an excellent choice for web development projects.
